title: Topic 04 Question 08
body: Your company develops several applications that are accessed as custom enterprise applications in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).
You need to recommend a solution to prevent users on a specific list of countries from connecting to the applications.
What should you include in the recommendation?
options: activity policies in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
sign-in risk policies in Azure AD Identity Protection
device compliance policies in Microsoft Endpoint Manager
user risk poticies in Azure AD Identity Protection
